review_title: Origami is an Excellent and Rewarding Company to Serve
job_title: Speech-Language Pathologist in Mason, MI
pros: Origami offers a unique rehabilitative environment that allows its employees to provide the best possible care in order for clients to achieve the best outcomes.  There is fantastic communication among the interdisciplinary team and the work culture is great.  As an employee, I have the resources I need to perform my job and management is open to implementing new ideas that will improve the services we provide. Employees are encouraged to participate in various committees and in professional growth opportunities.
cons: Sometimes caseloads can get very busy, as we've experienced with our recent influx of clients as a result of Origami's expansion, but management is very active in making sure employees have the time and resources they need to do their job well and manage work-related stress!
